title: GemCaveToken
author: GemCaveToken
content: Seasons come and go — and with them come and go the seasonal meme coins we see. These can range from complete failures (chinese newyear tiger coin) to complete successes (christmastreeBNB).So why do people invest? Some investors do it because they know that buying into a SAFE seasonal coin anytime before december is almost guarenteed to give you a raise in value. But how do you know its safe? For the most part you dont — But when you know the team working on the project have a reputation to uphold it adds a whole new level of trust.ChristmasTreeBNBThe team at ChristmasTreeBNB are a well known team with an existing mass-utility project and a huge community. Using the resources they already have they plan to propel the XMASTREE currency for a second year running which is another key factor when looking to invest in seasonal meme coins. Since ChristmasTreeBNB has been around since November of 2021, the tokenomics have been proven and tested, the team are clearly loyal — having extended the LP lock period for another 365 days and the development is none stop.Learn more about ChristmasTreeBNB here at : https://christmastreebnb.com/XMASTREE Smart Contract : 0xc88c71d3ff21e255e8502fa67226ecf0ffd956d0
